title: JavaScript SDK
description: Build and maintain a JavaScript library for thenewboston.

title: .NET Core
description: Build and maintain a .NET Core SDK for thenewboston.

title: Back-End Developers
description: Build and maintain the APIs related to the website and the digital currency network.

contributors.title: Head of Python Client Library Development

title: Communications
description: Communicating with each team to receive weekly updates identifying progress, opportunities, hardships, etc.

responsibilities.item: Receive weekly status updates from each team

title: Community
description: Liaising with job applicants and team leads. Choosing the right job applicants and sending it to team leaders base on departments for further scrutiny. We create the strategy, oversee the overall TNB product, create standards, and improve cross-collab between teams.

responsibilities.item: Get people to where they need to be. Greet, welcome, guide
People will come into #intros and must oversee other Slack channels for new users
Guide users to teams they fit into
Team Leads are responsible for hiring more community managers
Provide user feedback and analytics to design team
Suggest better methods on how to gather user feedback

title: Design
description: We create and manage all designs within thenewboston website & app.

responsibilities.item: Help identify what needs to be built based off user feedback
User test designs with the community
Write product requirements for engineering handoff
Give design reviews to members within the community

title: DevOps
description: Provides systems for the systems. Focused on underlying infrastructure (servers, OS, networking, access security), services (web servers, databases), as well as monitoring and automating the configuration of those items.

title: Discord
description: Managing Discord server for thenewboston Community.

title: Front-End Developers
description: Basically, everything that the user can interact with, comes under this team's scope. We'll be mostly working on the Website and Account Manager repo.

title: Blog
description: In charge of all things related to the thenewboston blog

title: Kotlin SDK
description: Provide a Kotlin client library.

title: Marketing
description: My team handles all the marketing part including email, SEO, and media buys. Developing and Executing marketing strategies as well as focusing on user behaviour and contacts/partnership collection.

responsibilities.item: Help drive traffic through social media
Sending out social media posts on core team applications
If posting anything, post it on all social media accounts
If any other social media sites that can be strategical, we can expand

title: New User Operations
description: Convert new users to task contributors or team members.

responsibilities.item: Identify where new users will get stuck
Increase user retention by keeping users engaged

title: Payments
description: The team handles the payments of all thenewboston contributors in different capacities.

title: Project Proposals
description: This team is responsible for managing all the App Ideas from developers all around the globe.

subitems: Seeing if there are any empty fields
Tell users to fill out project proposals instead of typing it out on Slack
Help clarify the details of what the app is
Talking to them for suggestions as well
Responsible for setting and agreeing on timeline with other party
Responsible for being part of check-ins

responsibilities.item: Make payment GitHub issues when projects are due

title: QA
description: Identify and detect bugs in our apps to increase the quality of our products for improved customer satisfaction.

title: Reddit Moderators
description: We moderate posts on reddit and post job openings on it. Also other additional tasks given by bucky is also done by us. Thanks

title: Research
description: We research the latest developments in blockchain technology and identify strategic opportunities.  We work closely with the development teams on their crypto-economic model, protocol, architecture, and strategy.

responsibilities.item: Offer suggestions to help guide the future roadmap
Researching technology that exists that could improve ours
Identify areas within blockchain that we can partner with

title: Security
description: Currently we are two members only. Working on security roadmap. Trying to keep the blockchain network safe from adversaries and ensuring the services are always available to the end user

title: YouTube
description: Dedicated to developer evangelism as well as general adoption of the coin through YouTube videos.

responsibilities.item: Reaching out to YouTubers related to blockchain and programming
Deciding on the best strategy for what to film and what channel to put it on
